As per the MCA, the road is to be maintained in same condition as it was seven days prior to the submission of RFP . The certain stretches some time needs extensive repair in the intervening period in case of damages due to flood or torrential rain: Hence it has been decided that proper maintenance of such damaged stretches awarded under 6-laning (Phase V) may be carried out by using DBM, BC (as per site requirement) for keeping the road in traffic worthy condition during development period. Accordingly, in future  provision for such anticipated situation may be kept in the estimates. 2 strict compliance of the above instructions be ensured. 3_ This issue with the approval of Competent Authority: palh (S.K; Nirmal) General Manager & Coord;) To= 1, PS to Chairman 2.
